messages.content: Please beep the extra motion sensor and turn off the Jennifer Remote - B Neon Sign.
Set the ramp rate of the FR Picture Lights to 1.0 minute and brighten them.
Turn on the light and set it to 50%. Also, beep the extra motion sensor.
CLARIFY: Which light do you want to turn on and set to 50%—FR Picture Lights or Jennifer Remote - B Neon Sign?
